results.name: a(n) = 5^n + 2^n - 1^n.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (8,-17,10).
formula: a(n) = 7*a(n-1)-10*a(n-2)-4 with a(0)=1, a(1)=6. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 21 2010
results.author: _Mohammad K. Azarian_, Jan 24 2009
